tasks.label: Clean up auxiliary files
tasks.command: rm -fr assets/*.acn assets/*.acr assets/*.alg assets/*.aux assets/*.bbl assets/*.blg assets/*.fdb_latexmk *fls assets/*.glg assets/*.glo assets/*.gls assets/*.ist assets/*.lof assets/*.log assets/*.lot assets/*.out assets/*.pdf assets/*.pygtex assets/*.pygstyle assets/*.synctex\(busy\) assets/*.synctex.gz assets/*.toc assets/svg-inkscape/
